appraisal.reason: According to this newsletter, weekday confessions are 12:00 - 12:20 and Sunday confessions are 10:00 - 10:30 and 12:00 - 12:30, as you stated. However, on Saturdays the evening confessions conclude at 5:50pm, not 6:00pm. Please note the Saturday schedule is 10:00 - 11:00 and 5:00 - 5:50pm.
Per the newsletter, weekday Confession is from 12.15pm to 12.40pm (not 12.00pm to 12.40pm). Saturday Confession runs 5.30pm to 5.55pm (not until 6.00pm). No Confession is listed on Sundays.

name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel & St Simon Stock
